sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT L2_switch_type 
FROM dbo.vb_tbl_job a
JOIN dbo.vb_tbl_trigger b ON a.trigger_id = b.trigger_id
WHERE b.trigger_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.Trigger}'

SELECT DISTINCT L3_switch_type 
FROM dbo.vb_tbl_job a
JOIN dbo.vb_tbl_trigger b ON a.trigger_id = b.trigger_id
WHERE b.trigger_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.Trigger}'

SELECT DISTINCT L4_switch_type 
FROM dbo.vb_tbl_job a
JOIN dbo.vb_tbl_trigger b ON a.trigger_id = b.trigger_id
WHERE b.trigger_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.Trigger}'

@concat(
  'SELECT * FROM ',
  pipeline().parameters.TableName,
  ' WHERE LastModifiedDate > ''',
  activity('LookupOldWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue,
  ''' AND LastModifiedDate <= ''',
  activity('LookupNewWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue,
  ''''
)
